detectors.description:

	-_poolAmount = _tokens.mul(POOL_FEE).div(100) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDAONetwork.sol#275)
	-info.scaledPayoutPerToken += _poolAmount.mul(FLOAT_SCALAR).div(info.totalStaked) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDAONetwork.sol#284)

detectors.description:
BDAONetwork.collect() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDAONetwork.sol#179-189) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(_dividends >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDAONetwork.sol#181)

BDAONetwork.collect() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDAONetwork.sol#179-189) uses timestamp for comparisons
